https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6TcRDQazJSBfHJrjk9scYftSqw1.jpg Examining the anime phenomenon from the perspectives of both the Eastern and Western cultures, while exploring the similarities and differences in the ways that fans enjoy the art form. Short documentary, part of the "Appleseed Ex Machina" Special Edition. Appleseed Saga: Ex Machina - East Meets West
